PERSONA:
sarah is a 38-year-old white woman living in a metropolitan area in the northeastern united states, specifically in the middle atlantic region. she holds a college degree and has pursued some post-graduate education. sarah was born and raised in the united states, and she is a citizen of the country.

sarah is married and identifies as having a liberal ideology. she is registered to vote at her current address and leans toward supporting the democratic party. despite being non-religious, she occasionally attends religious services a few times a year.

financially, sarah belongs to the upper-income tier, with a family income of $100,000 or more. she is an active member of her community and regularly volunteers her time.

sarah is tech-savvy and uses the internet almost constantly. she leads a metropolitan lifestyle and values her education and career. while she respects different beliefs, she maintains a progressive and open-minded outlook on life.
